main event: A Jefferson County deputy sheriff observed a cigarlike glowing object in the sky over Bessemer, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was described as having a luminous glow and a soft slow glitter., The deputy sheriff, Aubrey Yates, reported that the object glided along slowly before disappearing in about three seconds., The size of the object was compared to an auto tire and was noted to be yellow or orange., The U.S. Weather Bureau received several calls about the same object., The deputy expressed fear, stating it wasn't any kind of airplane.
sighted object: a cigarlike object with a luminous glow
witness description: Aubrey Yates, Jefferson County deputy sheriff
